title: Senior Data Analyst
description:
Join our data team to drive strategic insights that shape product and business decisions.

Responsibilities:
• Analyze large datasets using SQL and Python to uncover actionable insights
• Build dashboards and reports for stakeholders
• Conduct A/B tests and experiments to measure feature impact
• Partner with product and business teams to define KPIs
• Identify growth opportunities through market and portfolio analysis
• Present findings to leadership with clear data storytelling

Requirements:
• 3+ years experience in data analysis
• Expert SQL skills; proficiency with Python or R
• Experience with BI tools (Tableau, Looker, PowerBI)
• Strong understanding of statistical methods
• Track record translating data into business insights
• Excellent communication skills

title: Senior Product Manager
description:
We're looking for a Product Manager to lead development of platform features and drive user-centered design.

Responsibilities:
• Define product vision and roadmap aligned with business goals
• Conduct user research through interviews, surveys, and data analysis
• Collaborate with engineering, design, and data teams to ship features
• Use analytics to measure feature adoption and business impact
• Lead sprint planning and stakeholder communication
• Drive go-to-market strategy for new launches

Requirements:
• 4+ years product management experience
• Strong analytical skills with proficiency in SQL
• Experience conducting user research and applying human-centered design
• Proven ability to ship products and scale features
• Excellent stakeholder management
• Data-driven decision making

title: Management Consultant
description:
Join our strategy consulting practice to solve business challenges for clients across industries.

Responsibilities:
• Lead client engagements on growth strategy and market analysis
• Conduct market research and competitive analysis
• Build financial models and business cases
• Analyze data to drive evidence-based recommendations
• Present findings to senior leadership
• Mentor junior team members

Requirements:
• 2-4 years consulting or strategy experience
• Strong analytical skills with proficiency in Excel and SQL
• Experience across multiple industries (insurance, tech, financial services)
• Excellent communication and stakeholder management
• MBA or equivalent experience preferred
• Track record of driving measurable impact

title: Strategy & Operations Associate
description:
Drive strategic initiatives and operational improvements for our growing organization.

Responsibilities:
• Analyze business metrics to identify opportunities and risks
• Lead cross-functional projects from planning to execution
• Conduct market research and competitive intelligence
• Build frameworks for decision-making and prioritization
• Partner with leadership to define and track OKRs
• Support pricing, planning, and portfolio optimization

Requirements:
• 2-4 years in strategy, operations, or analytics role
• Strong quantitative and analytical skills
• Experience with SQL and data analysis tools
• Proven project management abilities
• Excellent communication skills
• Entrepreneurial mindset and comfort with ambiguity
